abstract: Time has run out for Carl C. Icahn’s hostile tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment, which expired at 11:59 p.m. on Wednesday. But so far, Lions Gate stock has shown little reaction.
snippet: Time has run out for Carl C. Icahn’s hostile tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment, which expired at 11:59 p.m. on Wednesday. But so far, Lions Gate stock has shown little reaction.
lead_paragraph: Time has run out for Carl C. Icahn‘s hostile tender offer for Lions Gate Entertainment — but do investors really care?

headline.main: Witching Hour Past for Icahn’s Lions Gate Bid
